comments.body: This is a nit pick. But such utils function can often be added in the companion object of the same class. So this could have been added to `object KinesisRecordProcessor`
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,79 @@

+package org.apache.spark.streaming.kinesis
+
+import scala.util.Random
+
+import org.apache.spark.Logging
+
+import com.amazonaws.services.kinesis.clientlibrary.exceptions.InvalidStateException
+import com.amazonaws.services.kinesis.clientlibrary.exceptions.KinesisClientLibDependencyException
+import com.amazonaws.services.kinesis.clientlibrary.exceptions.ShutdownException
+import com.amazonaws.services.kinesis.clientlibrary.exceptions.ThrottlingException
+
+
+/**
+ * Helper for the KinesisRecordProcessor.
+ */
+private[kinesis] object KinesisRecordProcessorUtils extends Logging {
